description: [Lazarus Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0032) has used VBA and embedded macros in Word documents to execute malicious code.(Citation: McAfee Lazarus Jul 2020)(Citation: ClearSky Lazarus Aug 2020)(Citation: Lazarus APT January 2022)(Citation: Qualys LolZarus)
